Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Elnur
Reviews.Content: I've ordered this notebook on February. Very satisfied with It. One thing makes me annoying is the fan speed, but It is easly fixes by updating BIOS from DELL official web-site. Now there is no heavy fan speed! Just perfect!

Reviews.Title: Product is great however makes a lot of noise
Reviews.Author: N. Arrazola-Duval
Reviews.Content: I guess it is the fan in the computer.  It makes a lot of noise.  other than that it is great.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product!
Reviews.Author: Michael Mills "Bilay"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product! That's all I can say. Mine not as noisy as other reviewers have claimed theirs to be. Very quiet machine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent large screen laptop.
Reviews.Author: HeartlandLiberal
Reviews.Content: Solid, great monitor.Of course as soon as it was out of the box, I wiped the disk, and installed a clean Windows 8.1 image on it. But that is because I neither want nor need all the Dell recovery and the software trying to sell itself to you that comes with the OEM shipped install. But that is for you to decide.I needed a new laptop to support not only the little bit of consulting I still do, but also because it is great for games, such as Houdini Chess.A full featured, solid Dell laptop. My old Dell Latitude just would not die after 10 years, and I had to have a new laptop to support the development software I use now, ASP.NET, SQL server, Visual Studio, etc. At which this laptop with its large screen excels.

Reviews.Title: WTFF
Reviews.Author: Arcara
Reviews.Content: This laptop is just freakin awsome other reviewers complain too much expecting a perfect computer which does not exsist(stop nitpicking at the smallest s***) this thing kicks ass fast speed and space smooth on fps game play mmorpgs as well easy to handle and super fast program switching thanks to windows 8 i can use a series of music programs ect. GJ !!!

Reviews.Title: Great Machine
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great Machine, it is solid and does what is asked of it.While it has a large foot print it is still easy to carry.Use it as a portable or to replace a desktop. Either way, it is a Dell! Hate Windows 8

Reviews.Title: The moniter is too bright
Reviews.Author: Edward Paull
Reviews.Content: Works great a a computer should.  The "keys" are a bit too sensetive, and sometimes skip around. I have been unable to lower the brghtness level on the computer.  Other than these too features, it is great...works great, and is fast.

Reviews.Title: A very good laptop
Reviews.Author: Binh d.
Reviews.Content: This laptop is good for the family with better quality and nice apps. This Dell laptop is also good for my daughter who usually put her homework documents in the computer.

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase great computer
Reviews.Author: Joseph E. Zeigler "jaconz"
Reviews.Content: The laptop works great I have absolutely no problems with it. this dell is very very fast I would recommend it to anyone looking for an amazing computer

Reviews.Title: Great laptop with a huge screen.
Reviews.Author: Konstantin Samoylov
Reviews.Content: Arrived very quickly. The laptop is exactly what I expected. Very fast, great screen, nice sound. I had another 17'' Dell before and I hope this one will work for years too.

Reviews.Title: Very fast -- but with some issues
Reviews.Author: Rich Feyerabend "Rich F"
Reviews.Content: This appears to be a very fast machine, which one would expect with an i7.  However, the DVD drive is very loud; I'm still determining if there is something wrong with it.Also -- and this isn't a Dell issue -- but it's difficult to ascertain how satisified I am with the PC because I really, really dislike Windows 8.  It's not intuitive, was clearly designed for touchscreens and is a frustrating interface.  I'd pay big money to go back to Windows 7

Reviews.Title: FAST
Reviews.Author: Juan Pedro Rachet
Reviews.Content: Fast and very easy to use W8.Beautifull screen.Great storage spaceVery good battery life.Will like to upgrade to 16 RAM(can I ?)

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 17 i17RM-2903sLV 17.3-inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
Reviews.Author: David H. Leech
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly and was exactly as I expected.  I did change to windows 7 only because I am more comfortable with that system.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Tatiane
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop, if you are looking for something to do EVERYTHING that you need to.I use this for work, to do homework and to acess my social media.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Mr Neil
Reviews.Content: This Dell Inspiron 17 i17RM-2903sLV 17.3-Inch Laptop is a very nice machine. The performance is flawless thus far. I really like the appearance and feel of the brushed aluminum body. I'm a big boy so I am not intimidated by the size and weight of this machine. I like it!

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Joanna Torres
Reviews.Content: Excellent product ! Dell is a really good brand and the service was on time and everything good.Thanks a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Dalya84
Reviews.Content: Although I will admit it took me a while to set it up because I was having issues with wireless not turning on but the FN key and F2 resolved that issue. Thank God for the function key. Also, when you purchase this computer used make sure you contact Dell and get the registration transferred over to your name or else they will not help you with any problems. I had to send a copy of my receipt to Dell to verify that I was the owner. It took some time to resolve but I handled it like a pro.Overall the computer works fine. This is primarily used as a business computer and it has not had any issues what so ever. It was bought in very good condition and it works fin. No cosmetic damage or anything. Like I stated the wireless was turned off and I had to use the function key to get it working but after I did that I had no problems. I am not a huge fan of windows 8 but that is a subjective matter. It's a fast, great, sleek, and beautiful laptop. I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Cindy Weir
Reviews.Content: Thought this new system with windows 8 and the most recent processor would be amazing but -- most of my programs like word-and my media programs for the recordings and musci are constantly "not responding" - which is very frustrating -- I am actually thinking of returning this laptop and just getting an apple - because the Dell service is the worst as well - such a run around and no answers just more of a mess gets made -- love amazon but this is quite a junky piece of equipment

Reviews.Title: It's an alright computer, but don't have too high of an expectation
Reviews.Author: Manuel Ugarteche T
Reviews.Content: Got this computer a day ago and we are already having problems with it. The biggest problem I have is the registration of the computer with Dell. I know it's supposed to be helpfull, but it is cumbersome and doesn't flow right. Windows 8 is a problem as well, because it is such a large departure from the windows standard. They should have changed the layout of the keyboard as well, in order to achieve the complete effect on their customers. I'm looking into erasing the hardrive and installing windows 7. Maybe I will just return the thing.

Reviews.Title: I like it!!!
Reviews.Author: I. Okumura
Reviews.Content: The laptop is really fast. I like the material but sometimes it feels electricity when it's connected. I think it must have a light when the NumLk botton is on or off, that's all. I recommed it!!

ProductInfo.Features:
3rd Generation Intel Core i7-3537U Processor (4M Cache, up to 3.1 GHz)
8 GB DDR3 RAM
1 TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 17 i17RM-2903sLV 17.3-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
